articles.author: Benjamin Clymer
articles.title: New Rolex Daytona With Caliber 4131 - HODINKEE
articles.description: With a slightly redesigned case and bezel, too.
articles.content: "The dial receives new graphic balance, and harmonious colour combinations accentuate the contrast between the dial and the counters or their rings. The Oyster case has been redesigned, and its profi… [+572 chars]
